text: Katarina Barley (born 19 November 1968) is a German politician and lawyer who has been a Member of the European Parliament since 2019. She was the Federal Minister of Justice and Consumer Protection in the fourth Cabinet of Angela Merkel. She was also the Federal Minister of Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth and, from 28 September 2017, as the acting Federal Minister of Labour and Social Affairs, both until 14 March 2018. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Justice ministers of Germany Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Politicians from Cologne Category:German lawyers Category:Politicians from Rhineland-Palatinate Category:MEPs for Germany Category:Labor ministers of Germany Category:Family Affairs, Senior Citizens, Women and Youth ministers of Germany
title: Katarina Barley
